pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Anti-Oxidant Firming Lotion 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Anti-Oxidant Firming Lotion with Marine Seaweed uses the inherent skin-toning properties of natural ingredients such as seaweed, coconut oil, sweet almond oil and caffeine to leave your skin feeling its best, by naturally toning and visibly tightening skin, for a firmer, smoother appearance.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

100% of women felt more confident*, 98% reported their skin firmness improved*, 96% reported a smoother less dimpled appearance*, and 98% reported tighter, toned skin*. *After 4 weeks. * Independent in-use test; 50 subjects.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Polyimide-1, Sodium Polyacrylate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Fucus Vesiculoss Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Caffeine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Rahnella/Soy Protein Ferment, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Polysorbate-20, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Trisodium EDTA, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Coumarin.

Directions

Use daily to moisturise and tone. Massage into skin in a circular motion, concentrating on problem areas.
